ComicInfo.Title: First Flight
ComicInfo.Summary: The British writing maestro, who helped usher in Vertigo with his launch of Hellblazer, returns to comics with his radical new vision of the future. Following the psychestryke that threatens to destabilize Narcopolis, the agents of TRUST go on the offensive rustling up all citizens who could be inflicted with the BadEvil. Gray Neighbor escapes the cordon and meets up with the luscious Agent Love, who may change his mind about MamaDream and the evils of the suck. Crafting whole new chunks of language, and stunning concepts of a bizarre new world, Jamie Delano delivers a masterful new series that has to been seen to be believed!
